reviews.review_msg: She's not an approachable person and she isn't professional at work. She discusses her personal problems in class. She's disorganized and all over the place with her lectures.

It's a shame we're only allowed so many characters on here as Ted is an exceptional instructor that far surpassed my expectations. The course itself was not a breeze (5 essays?) but if you're looking to improve your writing skills, definitely take this class.   Great guy and if you're willing to put in the work; he'll definitely recognize it.
